org.jerkar.api.java

Class JkUrlClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.api.java.JkUrlClassLoader

  • public final class JkUrlClassLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Wrapper around URLClassLoader offering convenient methods and fluent interface to deal with URLClassLoader.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.nio.file.PathMatcher CLASS_FILE_FILTER
      A PathMatcher accepting only .class files.

      Returns all classes of this classloader that are defined in entries matching the specified fileFilter.
      For example : if you want to load all classes that are defined in folder and not andAccept jar file, you have to provide a FileFilter which includes only directories.

        A PathMatcher accepting only .class files.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static JkUrlClassLoader of(java.net.URLClassLoader urlClassLoader)

      • ofCurrent

        public static JkUrlClassLoader ofCurrent()
        Returns a JkUrlClassLoader wrapping the current thread context classloader.
        See Also:
        Class.getClassLoader()

      • ofSystem

        public static JkUrlClassLoader ofSystem()
        Returns a JkUrlClassLoader wrapping the ofSystem class loader.
        See Also:
        ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader()

      • ofLoaderOf

        public static JkUrlClassLoader ofLoaderOf(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Returns a JkUrlClassLoader wrapping the class loader having loaded the specified class.

      • getUrlCacheDir

        public static java.nio.file.Path getUrlCacheDir()
        Get the directory where are cached urls. For its internal use, Jerkar may copy the the content of an URL to a file. This class manages the central place where those URL are cached.

      • getDelegate

        public java.lang.ClassLoader getDelegate()
        Return the URLClassLoader wrapped by this object.

      • getParent

        public JkUrlClassLoader getParent()
        Returns the class loader parent of this one.

      • getChild

        public JkUrlClassLoader getChild(java.lang.Iterable<java.nio.file.Path> extraEntries)
        Creates a JkClassLoader, child of this one and having the specified entries.

      • getSibling

        public JkUrlClassLoader getSibling(java.net.URL... fileOrUrls)
        Creates a JkClassLoader loader having the same parent and the same entries as this one plus the specified entries. URL entries that are not file are transformed to file (created in temp folder).

      • getSibling

        public JkUrlClassLoader getSibling(java.lang.Iterable<java.net.URL> fileOrUrls)
        See Also:
        getSibling(Iterable)

      • getSiblingWithOptional

        public JkUrlClassLoader getSiblingWithOptional(java.net.URL... fileOrUrls)
        Same as getSibling(URL...) but more tolerant about the input. If one of the specified entry is not valid, then it is simply ignored.

      • getSiblingPrintingSearchedClasses

        public JkUrlClassLoader getSiblingPrintingSearchedClasses(java.util.Set<java.lang.String> searchedClassContainer)
        Returns a getSibling of this class loader that outputs every searched class.
        See Also:
        getSibling(Iterable)

      • getDirectClasspath

        public JkClasspath getDirectClasspath()
        Returns the classpath of this classloader without mentioning classpath of the parent classloaders.

      • getFullClasspath

        public JkClasspath getFullClasspath()
        Returns the complete classpath of this classloader.

      • toJkClassLoader

        public JkClassLoader toJkClassLoader()

      • loadClassesInEntries

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> loadClassesInEntries(java.nio.file.PathMatcher entryFilter)
        Returns all classes of this classloader that are defined in entries matching the specified fileFilter.
        For example : if you want to load all classes that are defined in folder and not andAccept jar file, you have to provide a FileFilter which includes only directories.
        Parameters:
        entryFilter - The classpath entry filter. Can be null.

      • loadClasses

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> loadClasses(java.lang.String... globPatterns)
        Loads all class having a relative path matching the supplied ANT pattern. For example, if you want to load all class belonging to my.packAllArtifacts or its sub package, then you have to supply a the following pattern my/packAllArtifacts/**/*.

      • loadClassesIn

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> loadClassesIn(JkPathTreeSet jkPathTreeSet)
        Returns all classes of this classloader that are defined inside the provided JkPathTreeSet.
        See Also:
        loadClassesInEntries(PathMatcher)

      • loadFromNameOrSimpleName

        public <T> java.lang.Class<? extends T> loadFromNameOrSimpleName(java.lang.String name,
                                                                 java.lang.Class<T> superClassArg)
        Loads the class having the specified full name or the specified simple name. Returns null if no class matches.
        For example : loadFromNameOrSimpleName("MyClass", null) may returns my.packAllArtifacts.MyClass class.
        Parameters:
        name - The full name or the simple value of the class to load
        superClassArg - If not null, the search is narrowed to classes/interfaces children of this class/interface.
        Returns:
        The loaded class or null.

      • findMainClass

        public static java.lang.String findMainClass(java.nio.file.Path classDirOrJar)
        Returns the first class having a main method from the specified class directory or Jar. Returns null if no such class found.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • addEntries

        public void addEntries(java.nio.file.Path path1,
                       java.nio.file.Path path2,
                       java.nio.file.Path... others)
        Add a new entry to this class loader. WARN : This method has side effect on this class loader : use it with caution !

      • addEntries

        public void addEntries(java.lang.Iterable<java.nio.file.Path> paths)
        Same as addEntries(Path, Path, Path...).
        Parameters:
        paths - As Path class implements Iterable the argument can be a single Path instance, if so it will be interpreted as a list containing a single element which is this argument.

      • loadAllServices

        public void loadAllServices()
        Reloads all J2SE service providers. It can be necessary if adding dynamically some service providers to the classpath.
